attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2011-0908

Date: 2011-09-21

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin S. MacLeod, Usher of the Black Rod, Senate, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($94,600 - $111,200), effective April 1, 2011.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alain Beaudet, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 10 ($250,800 - $295,000), effective April 1, 2011.
